cfg.schemaFileMatch.description: Optional manual file patterns for helm-apps schema in yaml.schemas (empty = auto-detect helm-apps charts).

cfg.disableYamlSchemaHover.description: Disable YAML extension schema hover blocks (e.g. 'Source: values.schema.json') to keep only helm-apps contextual hovers.
cfg.librarySource.description: Global source mode for helm-apps chart dependency updates: local chart path or GitHub-managed cache.
cfg.libraryLocalChartPath.description: Global path to local helm-apps chart directory (must contain Chart.yaml) used when source=local.
cfg.libraryGithubRepo.description: Library repository URL (Helm repo or GitHub repo URL) used to check/download helm-apps chart versions.
cfg.libraryGithubCachedChartPath.descrip: Extension-managed cached helm-apps chart path downloaded from GitHub.
cfg.libraryGithubCachedVersion.descripti: Version of cached helm-apps chart downloaded from GitHub.
